div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxviij die mensis Januarij anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais the ferd day
of februar nixt to cum to ser androw colisone To comper befor tham
and thai suld gar warne Johnne thomsone to compeir the saide
day ande mak him pament of his annuel rent aucht tile him yerly
of ane land' liand' in the vuurkirkgait samekile as he can preive
Sufficiently awing to him of ale termes bigane quhilk land'
he hed' processit for his annuele ande gif thai failye tharintile
and makis him nocht be content ande pait of his said annuel
thai suld do to the said ser androw it that accordis thame to do of
thar office but ony dilatouris or delay

The said day Johnne barrehill grantit him avand' to William sclatar
iiij s' viij d' quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The said day the bailyes continewit Dauid stralochis preuis anent xvj s'
alegijt aving to him be robert Waus to this day viij dais in siclik forme
and effect' as it is now et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxixo
die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the borgh' fundin be Johnne reid' one William Walcar
dekin of the Walcaris for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij d'
to the furnising of thar part of candilmes play was fundin awaile
for the quhilkis the said William was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera
be ane suorn' assis' thomas lesly forspekar

The said day the borgh' fundin one Johnne reid' be William
Walcar for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xij s' to compt
and raknyn' was fundin of nane awaile be ane suorn' assis'
thomas lesly forspekar for the quhilkis the said William was in
ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day alexander hay menit him to the aldirman and' ballies
that patry reid' and Johne crak hed castin in the sey vxx and x skynnis
ande xv selche skynnis and' the aldirman and bailyeis inquerit at
the said alexander gif he was plantius' one the said patry and Johnne or
gif he wald' persew thame or wald' preiwe ony skatht done to thame
be the said patry ande Johne thai suld' minister Justice ande mak
him be content safer as he mycht preif that thai hed' skathit him
or yit war fundin be the law and the said patry and Johne of
ferit thame rady tile vndirly the law befor the said aldirman and'
balyeis thar Jug ordinar in ony thingis that the said alexander hed'
to say to thame Ande the said alexander refusit to follou thim thar
sayand he hed thaim summond befor our souerane lord and his counsaile

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouest and' bailyes and'
diuers' of the counsaile present for the tyme that nay broustaris within this
burgh' sale brewe aill derrar than' viij d' the gallone as is contenit in
the actis of the buk maid obefor And gif ony that is conuict' sene micha
elmes bigane for selling of xij penny aill and brewis hereftir and'
brekis the said statut' and beis conuict' tharof thar caldron' or leid'
sale be brocht to the mercat croice and' strukin furtht the bodome of
It and' thai to tbe secludit fra brewing for an' yeir' and' to pay
the amerciament of the court vneforgevin et cetera

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the alderman bailyes
and diuers' of the counsaile present for the tyme that the four officiaris sale
pas oukly Ilkane sonday quhile michalmes nixt tocum with that cun
naris Ilkane in thar avin quartar and cum and set the aill and'
writ the namis of the broustaris and' quhone thai set euery bro
ustaris aile and' bring thar naimes that thai set attentiwe
to the prouest and' bailyes Oukly vndir the pan' of depreuacioun'
of thar office

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The said day alexander hay one that ane part patry red' and Johnne
crak one that vthir part band' and' oblist thame be the faithtis
of thar boijs to stand' abid' and vndirly the law befor the prouest
and bailyes of the said burgh' thar Juge ordinar anent the
clame of vxx and x woll skynnis and xv selche skynnis clamit
be the said alexander one the said personis et cetera quhilk thai kest
our schipburd' as he allegeit and renuncit ourgef and' dischar
git Ilkane patry vthir of ale summonce persewit and' defence of the
sammyn and of ale dettis gif ony happinis to be gevin in the said matir
befor the lordis of our souerane lordis counsale and annullis the samyn

The said day aldirman and ballies assignit friday befor fastirinevin the ferd'
day of marche nixt to cum to patry reid and Johne crak tile ansuer to the borgh'
fundin one thaim be alexander hay burges of the said' burgh' for the wranguis' castin
of vxx and x wole skynnis of his ourschip burde in the sey but command' of the
skippar et cetera as day of peremptour but dilatouris with consent and assent of batht the said
partijs bringand' with thaim that day sic rychtis resonis and documentis as tha haue
and wile vys' in the said matir

The said day it was deliuerit and fundin be thir personis eftir writin eldast maist
famous' ande dekynnis of thar craftis that is to say Dauid theman'
gilbert litstar cristy prat alexander tailyour Johnne Wiyeamsone Wobistar
Johnne loremar' Johnne red' and Wilyeam Walcar suorn' the gret aitht
at command' of the aldirman and bailyes that the skynneris of this burgh' sale
pas' and gang befor the cordonaris in the processioun' of candilmes day
and ale vthir processionis that thia vis' to pas' intile within the said burgh'

The said day Duncane smitht grauntit that the hed' the charteris and euidencis
pertening to ser Johnne' stirueling of ane land of vmquhile Duncan tailyour
in his keping this yeir bigan and grantit to bring the said charteris and' evidencis
and deliuer thame to the alderman

div.head: februarij
div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In preotio eiusdem
primo die mensis Januarij feb anno quo supra

The said day patry red' mathow branche and Johnne crak one that
ane part Duncan crak robert red' Dauid futhes alexander Kintor Johnne
portar alexander thorne Dauid bannerman William chaishame Johne Wil
yongsone Duncan portar William stile and androw burnat one that vthir
part grantit and consentit that the witnes of baitht the said partijs
suld' be warnit to comper' one thurisday that nixt cumis within
the tolbutht befor the prouest and bailyes and thar be suorn' and thar depo
sicionis takin anent the castin of ane sacc of woll pertening to
to symone ellon' the said partijs hawand' thar lauchfull defence
tile excep agane the said witnes et cetera quhilk deposicionis
salbe closit and kepit quhile friday befor ffasterinevin nixt
to cum

head.add: red' branche crak and the merchandis

div.p:
The said day the prouest and balyes assignit friday the thrid'
day of the monetht of marche nixt to cum tile Duncan crak
robert red' Dauid futhes alexander Kintor Johnne portar alexander
horne Dauid bannerman William cheishame Johne Wilyongson'
Duncan portar William stile androw burnat and' to Dauid arrot
tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one thame be mathow branche
patry red' and Johnne crak that quhar thai ar vnder our soueran'
lordis summonce for the castin of ane sacc of woll pertening to
symon ellon thai gif sua beis the said woll be optenit one
thame that the said personis aucht to releif thame Ilkane man
as his part extendis to and wranguis and thai do it nocht

The said day Duncan crak grantit him awand' tile alexander
Kintor xviij s' gret to the releving of him of ane barrel of
salmonth' at the handis of androw cullan

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quarto die mensis februarij anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo vijo

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to ser androu colisone
that quhat annuell rent Johnne thomsone can nocht preiwe pait to the
said ser androw that the money laid' in Johne maris hand' the bailye
sale pay the said ser androue of four hour yeris annuell and' sonar gif
the said Johne cumis hame

Eodem die comparuit Judicialiter henricus reid et si dixit aliqua verba
iniuriosa Willelmo cheschame in furore reuocat ad annuum

The said day Williame cheschame was conuict' be ane suorne assis' thomas
leslie forspekar for the tribulance of henry reid' in word' and' the said William
henry conuict' for the tribulanc of the said' William for the quhilkis Ilkan' of
tham' was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day alexander malisone was conuict' be an' suorne assis' thomas
leslie forspekar for the tribulance of William' cheschame for the quhilkis he
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day William rolland come borgh' to pay or gar pay to malcom' nachtj
samekle' as Williame Walcar grantis awand' to him the arrest beand lousit

The said' day the bailyes continewit Dauid stralochis preuis to monunday that
nixt cummis with intimacioun' to robert Waus that quhedir he compeir or nocht
the said day iustice salbe ministirit to the party et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The said' day Johne baxtar patirsone Androw gordone and Donald' baxtar was
in amerciament of the court be thar' avin toung grauntis for brekin of the
pais' of bred' of quhet and brekin of commone ordinance et cetera to amende
as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum

The said' day Jonhne of ratre sone and ayr tile vmquhile Johne of Ratre
burges of the said burghe chesit constitut maid' and ordanit gilbert menyeis
prouest Alexander mortimer of Crageuere and Johne of mar' ane of the balyeis of
the samyn coniunctlie and seueralie his lauchfule Curatis and Curatoris to Reule
and governe him his landis and gudis quhile he cum to perfit age eftir the forme
of our Souerane lordis lavis et cetera

The said' day the prouest and balyeis continevit the takin of Dauid stralochis
preuis to monunday cum viij dais anent the xvj s' clamit one Robert Waus

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In futy ix die menis februarij
anno quo supra

The said' day Robert Wat in futy grauntit him aving to Richerde
Waus burges of the said' burghe hald ane barrele of Salmond' fule
rede and suet gude and sufficient merchande gude of the richtuis' bynde of
abirdene quhilk he oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay to the saide
Richerd' at the fest of Natiuite of Sanct Johne Callit mydsommir next
eftir follouing

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
februarij anno quo supra

Eodem die georgius masse filius quondam Willelmum masse fecit constituit
creauit et nominauit gavinum murray suum legittimum et indubitatum curatum et curatorem
Irreuocabilem ad regendum se terras suas et bona sua donec peruenerit ad
perfectam etatem secundum Jura regij scocie

Eodem die compertum fuit oer inquisicionem curie quod magister thomas chamer
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam thome chamer patris sue de terris et annuis red
ditibus conquestis in tempore Elizibetht blinseil matris fuerit et cetera

The said day the borgh' fundin be robert crag and one henry bavne for
the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of v s' was fundin of nayne awaile
be ane suorne assis' charlis Stevinsone fforspekar for the quhilkis
the said robert was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tena in pretorio eiusdem xiijto die mensis
februarij Anno quo supra

The saide day Johne ramsay Oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to
pay tile Androw litstar xxviij s' Scottis money betuix this and fasterinevin'
next to cum for Johne quhit in tiry but ony langir delay fraude or gile

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' mathow branche Duncan fyf forspekar
that Ellene Scot sale pay to the wif of Jamis beruy iiijor and j par'
of Schone aving to hir' for hir' fee within terme of law Andwee atour thai orda
nit the said' Ellene to preiwe this day xv dais quhat hir' haik is availe
that scho Intromettit with and that salbe allouit in the pament of the said'
iiijor s' and Schone et cetera

The said day Alexander coupar and his wif Ilkane of thame was in ane
amerciament of the court for non apperance as thai that was lauchfully
warnit callit and nocht comperit et cetera

The said day Niniane cumin was in ane amerciament of the court in de
falt of apperance as he that was lauchfully warnit callit and nocht com
perit till ansuer for tribulance of marioun coupar

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
Octauo die mensis ffebruarij anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Johnne thomsone promittit faithtfully to pay to ser
Androw colisone chaplane fail xxij s' betuix this and evin And
gif he falyeis heruntill that the bailyes sale gif possessioun' to the
said sere androw eftir the tenour of his proces' to morn'

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod alanus serray
litstar est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Willelmum serray patris suj

The said day it wa statut and ordanit be the alderman and'
bailyes that nan' broustar within this burgh' sale brew xij penny aill
vnder the pane of strekin furtht of thar caldroun' bodomes And'
gif thai do that thar caldroun' bodomes sale be strikin furtht at
the mercat crois' withtout ony delay and' thar vnlawis to
be vptakin incontinent thareftir vnforgevin

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the alderman and
bailyes that the four officiaris sale kep the mercat oukly quhill
the wittaile be out of the mercat on this wis' William' scrimgeour
and Johnne cuk one Wednisday Normund lesly and androue
nauchtj one settirday and this to be kepit vndir the pan' of
depriuacioun' of thair office et cetera
